questions.question: The cute guy you've been talking to at the bar offers to buy you a drink. You tell him you want a...
options: A) Sex on the Beach.
B) Cosmopolitan
C)Martini
D) Whiskey on the rocks

questions.question: What’s your ideal date night?
options: A) A fancy dinner at a trendy restaurant
B) A cozy night in with takeout and a movie
C) A fun night out at a club or bar
D) A cultural outing like a gallery opening or a play

questions.question: How do you handle a breakup?
options: A) Cry it out and then hit the town
B) Focus on self-care and reflection
C) Go out with friends and find someone new
D) Seek closure and have a heart-to-heart

questions.question: What’s your go-to fashion style?
options: A) Chic and polished
B) Comfortable and laid-back
C) Trendy and bold
D) Eclectic and artistic

questions.question: What’s your relationship philosophy?
options: A) Love is worth the risk, go for it!
B) Better to take it slow and steady
C) Keep it fun and lighthearted
D) Seek deep emotional connection

questions.question: How do you feel about commitment?
options: A) Excited about the possibilities
B) Cautious and thoughtful
C) Enjoying the freedom of being single
D) Ready for a serious relationship

questions.question: What’s your idea of self-care?
options: A) A luxurious spa days
B) Reading a good book at home
C) A night out with friends
D) Trying out a new hobby

questions.question: How do you handle conflict in friendships?
options: A) Directly confront the issue
B) Avoid it until it blows over
C) Talk it out over drinks
D) Write a heartfelt letter

questions.question: How important is your social life?
options: A) Very important, I thrive on social interactions
B) I enjoy it, but I need my alone time
C) I love having a wide circle of friends
D) A few close friends are all I need

questions.question: What’s your take on marriage?
options: A) It’s a beautiful goal
B) It’s just a piece of paper
C) I’m open to it, but not in a rush
D) It depends on the relationship

questions.question: How do you like to celebrate milestones?
options: A) Throw a big party
B) Have an intimate dinner with loved ones
C) Go on a spontaneous trip
D) Create a special memory or experience

questions.question: What’s your approach to fashion?
options: A) Follow the latest trends
B) Dress for comfort first
C) Experiment with different styles
D) Wear what makes you feel unique

questions.question: How do you view your friendships?
options: A) As a priority in my life
B) Important, but not always at the forefront
C) Fun and lively, full of adventures
D) Deep and meaningful connections

questions.question: What’s your favorite type of romantic story?
options: A) A whirlwind romance
B) A slow-burn love story
C) A fun, casual fling
D) A complex, emotionally charged relationship
